author: psmith
msg: factored out some static inner classes into top level classes for general
usage.

author: psmith
msg: Added very early implementation of Pausing/Resuming a Receiver
via the GUI.
Only Socket Receiver is supported at this stage, and the toolbar
buttons aren't hooked up to the action, but single clicking a SocketReceiver
node in the tree will now toggle the active flag for that receiver
effectively discarding all received events unless active.
WIP. (This is also getting at a bit big for this class, will eventually move it out).

author: psmith
msg: A few changes here:
* There was a compile error due to some missing methods in one or
two Appenders/Receivers. (isActive() method was not implemented.
* Tweaked listeners implementation to be more JavaBean style, using
an EventListenerList.  This allows more than one listener to be added.
Kept support for older style usage, but would prefer to get rid of this
ASAP if it's not in use already.
* If SocketReceiver is not active, logging events are not received.

author: psmith
msg: updated to use the new java bean style listener usage.
plus tweaked the delay during the progress of shutdown.

author: psmith
msg: added a resume icon (it's really just a pointer to another resource).
